    • Method Detail

      • emit

        protected void emit(T value)

      • firstSubscriber

        protected void firstSubscriber()
        Called when the number of subscribers goes from 0 to 1. Overriding this method is a convenient way for subclasses to handle this event.

      • noSubscribers

        protected void noSubscribers()
        Called when the number of subscribers goes down to 0. Overriding this method is a convenient way for subclasses to handle this event.

      • subscribe

        public Subscription subscribe(java.util.function.Consumer<? super T> consumer)
        Description copied from interface: EventStream
        Get notified every time this stream emits a value.
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface EventStream<T>
        Parameters:
        consumer - function to call on the emitted value.
        Returns:
        subscription that can be used to stop observing this event stream.
